title: Generative & Evolving NPC Traits
description: Games feel scripted. Most have the traits of players and NPCs hard coded, limiting natural character development, novelty and replayability.

f6_assessments.q0: No details are given as to how on chain metadata is required to produce evolving NPC's in games. The proposer needs to explain what they are doing and how it is relevant to the proposal, not just state they are doing something.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan, and no evidence of experience to deliver it, so no confidence can be given to it being executed. Why is $17,888 required. What is it being spent on?
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer need to present a plan with clear deliverables and metrics against which to measure success.

f6_assessments.q2: Can't  rate as there are no kpis, metrics, roadmap or a way to measure progress presented in the proposal. Funds are not clear how they will be used to achieve the prescribed solution to this challenge. I really like the tittle and where this was heading.

solution: Onchain characters are becoming a reality, but only by introducing generative and evolving metadata will gameplay improve. We are doing so.
experience: Mix together an established digital artist, an NFT collector/advisor, a sprinkling of tokenomics, and a heaping of developer power.
